title: Looking for Top/Jungle/ADC
body:
Hey all.

Truth Gaming Corps is looking for a Top, Jungle and ADC for 2017 ranked flex queue second team.

Want bronze/silver ranks.

Please leave details in comments. Do not add me off this page unless I request.

Summoner Name:
Season 6 rank:
Current flex rank:
Best Champions for Role:
Role:

replies.body:
Krispy Kreme
Silver V
Bronze IV
Jungle: lee sin, rengar, jhin
Top: Riven
ADC: Vayne, Kalista, Lucian

I
Which position do you want to apply for?

Anus Explorer
Unranked (Silver 1 now after preseason)
Unranked
Vayne, caitlin, jinx, ezreal, lucian
ADC

"SparksElm" is my main, this account is what I use on the boards.
Got placed in Silver 2 last season, after my 10 provisinals. Did not play any more ranked after that. At least it was better than my Silver 3 in Season 4 (also only 10 games).
I haven't touched ranked this preseason. Originally it was just because I didn't want to get caught in the rush, but then these "miss-matching" issues occurred and I just figured it was best to avoid it all together for a while.
I deeply prefer ADC, even though I could seriously work on my last hitting. Preferred champs for ADC are Quinn, Kalista and Sivir, in that order.
I'm also partial to Top. Preferred champs for Top are Quinn, Maokai and Teemo, in that order.
Should be fairly obvious by this point, but Quinn is a bit of a favourite of mine. So consider that a deal-maker/breaker.

Summoner Name: Deep Sanity
Season 6 rank: Silver 4
Current flex rank: Bronze 3
Best Champions for Role: Vayne, Lucian, Twitch / Hecarim, xin Zhao, Reksai
Role: Adc/Jg

What rank are you guys? I don't think the system lets people more than a division apart queue together.

Krauser san
Plat 3
Plat 3
Top main: currently spamming Illaoi. Also play kench, sion, any champ that abuses colossus
We have a main team looking for a full roster, it should be just above this one in forums.
